name: dr-shah-surgical-practice
description: Professional surgical practice website for Dr. Shah built with Eleventy

scripts.build: eleventy && npm run build:home-css && npm run build:minify-js
scripts.build:home-css: postcss src/assets/css/main.css -o src/assets/css/main.home.css --env home && postcss src/assets/css/navigation.css -o src/assets/css/navigation.home.css --env home && postcss src/assets/css/utilities.css -o src/assets/css/utilities.home.css --env home && mkdir -p _site/assets/css && cp src/assets/css/*.home.css _site/assets/css/
scripts.build:minify-js: mkdir -p _site/assets/js && for f in _site/assets/js/*.js; do [ -f "$f" ] && npx terser "$f" -c -m -o "$f"; done

author: Dr. Shah
